Header: New Director at HR & HL Directorate Assumes Office
Content: Brigadier A.G.D.N Jayasundara of Sri Lanka Mechanized Infantry Regiment who was appointed as the new Director Human Rights and Humanitarian Law of the Army, assumed duties recently at his office. He is the 20th Director at Directorate of Human Rights and Humanitarian Law at the Army Headquarters. At his new office, Brigadier A.G.D.N Jayasundara performed religious observances and symbolically placed his signature for a formal document to signify the acceptance of his new appointment. He succeeded Brigadier P.A.D Kahapola, who passed away recently due to brief illness.
